com.filesender.HelperClasses

Class globals

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.filesender.HelperClasses.globals

  • public class globals
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing all the properties that have global usage and are used too often to put them in the local scope. It also contains some methods of general purpose. Its name is written with small case letters to highlight special destiny of this class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ConnectButton connectButton
      Connect button from toolbar, we need it to be global because we'll change it's content in couple of places.
      static java.net.Socket connectionSocket
      Socket with connection to the client that has connected to us.
      static java.util.Stack dirStack
      Internal variable, 'directory stack' for Remote Tree construction.
      static javax.swing.JFrame frame
      Whole program's frame.
      static java.lang.String localIP
      IP of local machine.
      static java.lang.String localPIN
      Password that is required if someone wants to connect to us.
      static javax.swing.JTree localTree
      Local JTree for displaying local tree model.
      static java.lang.Object previousDir
      Previous directory address in remote tree model.
      static java.net.InetAddress remoteIP
      IP of the server that we are connected to as a client.
      static javax.swing.JTextField remoteIPTextField
      Remote IP Text Field from toolbar, we need it to be global because we'll change it's content in couple of places.
      static javax.swing.JTextField remotePinTextField
      Remote PIN Text Field from toolbar, we need it to be global because we'll change it's content in couple of places.
      static javax.swing.JTree remoteTree
      Remote JTree for displaying remote tree model.

      • remoteIP

        public static java.net.InetAddress remoteIP
        IP of the server that we are connected to as a client. If null, it means that we are not connected.

      • connectionSocket

        public static java.net.Socket connectionSocket
        Socket with connection to the client that has connected to us. Value of this variable is volatile and is changing after each new request.

      • localTree

        public static javax.swing.JTree localTree
        Local JTree for displaying local tree model.

    • Method Detail

      • toByte

        public static byte[] toByte(java.lang.Object object)
        Static method converting object of any class inheriting by Object to byte[] object.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be converted to byte[] form.
        Returns:
        Converted object in form of byte[].

      • toObject

        public static java.lang.Object toObject(byte[] encryptedObject)
        Static method converting object in byte[] form to Object. Result needs to be casted to desired class.
        Parameters:
        encryptedObject - byte[] object to be transformed to Object type.
        Returns:
        Converted object of type Object. Needs to be casted to desired class.

      • generatePIN

        public static java.lang.String generatePIN()
        Static method generating random 4-digit pin.
        Returns:
        Random PIN code.
